titleStmt.title: A letter sent to my lord maior. And his venerable bretheren: by no athist, no papist, no Arminian, no Anabaptist, no Familist, no separatist, or Brownist; but an honest beleeving Protestant, and that because that separatist otherwise called Brownist, was in many mens account said and held to be worse then papist. Written by A. S.
titleStmt.author: Streater, Aaron, b. 1609 or 10.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
